settings.label: Also apply templates to manually entered page titles?
Default
settings.info: this template will apply to all blank page types below

settings.label: Collection
settings.default: Shop %% current_tags || join: ', ' || append_not_empty: ' ' %%%% collection.title || escape %% at %% shop.name %%

settings.label: Catalog Page
settings.default: Browse %% collection.products || map: 'collections' || map: 'title' || uniq || take: '5' || join: ', ' || escape || remove: 'Home page, ' || remove: 'home page, '  || remove: 'Home page' || remove: 'Home page'  %% at %% shop.name %%

settings.label: Blog
settings.default: %% shop.name %% %% blog.title %%%% blog.all_tags || take: '5' || join: ', ' || prepend_not_empty: ' blog: ' || append_not_empty: ' and more' %%

settings.label: Article
settings.default: %% article.title %%%% article.tags || take: '3' || join: ', ' || prepend_not_empty: ' | ' || append_not_empty: ' and more' %% | %% shop.name %% %% blog.title %% blog

settings.content: Powered by Plug in SEO Plus
Meta descriptions are displayed as the paragraph text in search engines

settings.label: Also apply templates to manually entered meta descriptions?
Default
settings.info: this template will apply to all blank page types below

settings.label: Page
settings.default: %% page.content || strip_newlines || strip_html || escape || append_not_empty: '.' %% Visit %% shop.name %%

settings.label: Search
settings.default: Find %% search.terms || default: 'it' %% here%% search.results || map: 'title' || take: '3' || join: ', ' || prepend_not_empty: ' including ' || append_not_empty: ' and more' %% at %% shop.name %%

settings.label: Collection
settings.default: %% collection.all_tags || take: '3' || join: ', ' || prepend_not_empty: 'Shop ' || append_not_empty: ' and more ' %%%% collection.title || escape %% at %% shop.name %% %% collection.description || strip_html || strip_newlines || escape || strip %%

settings.label: Catalog Page
settings.default: Discover %% collection.products || map: 'title' || uniq || take: '3' || join: ', ' || escape %% and more.

settings.label: Blog
settings.default: %% blog.articles || map: 'title' || take: '3' || join: ', ' || prepend_not_empty: 'Read about ' || append_not_empty: ' and more on the '%%%% shop.name %% %% blog.title %% blog.

settings.label: Article
settings.default: %% article.excerpt_or_content || strip_newlines || strip_html || escape %%%% article.tags || take: '6' || join: ', ' || prepend_not_empty: ' Read about ' || append_not_empty: ' and more' %% %% article.title %% on the %% shop.name %% %% blog.title %% blog
